title: Winter squash salad with feta and caramelised onions
ingredients: ['1 acorn or butternut squash, halved and seeded', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '2 red onions, sliced', '4 tablespoons pine nuts', '150g feta, crumbled', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh mint', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', 'olive oil and balsamic vinegar to garnish']
